definition: A group of individuals who share a common interest or passion, often related to a particular activity, team, or artist. This term is commonly used to refer to the dedicated and enthusiastic fan base of a specific entity, such as a sports team, musician, or television show.

examples.german: Die Fangemeinde jubelte lautstark, als ihr Lieblingsteam das Spiel gewann.
examples.english: The fan community cheered loudly when their favorite team won the game.

examples.german: Die Fangemeinde des Films bildete eine starke Gemeinschaft, die sich regelmäßig austauschte.
examples.english: The fan community of the movie formed a strong community that regularly interacted.

examples.german: Die Fangemeinde des Künstlers war begeistert von seinem neuen Album.
examples.english: The fan community of the artist was thrilled with his new album.

examples.german: Die Fangemeinde des Buches organisierte eine Lesung mit dem Autor.
examples.english: The fan community of the book organized a reading with the author.

examples.german: Die Fangemeinde des Sportvereins unterstützte ihre Mannschaft bei jedem Spiel.
examples.english: The fan community of the sports club supported their team in every game.
